1.Replace 'ScrollableTabBar.js' of react-native-scrollable-tab-view in node_module with 
thirdParty/'ScrollableTabar.js' file. For the some customization

2.Replace 'index.js' of react-native-scrollable-tab-view in node_module with 
thirdParty/'index.js' file.


2.Replace 'PayUBizSdkModule.java' of payu-non-seam-less-react in node_module with 
thirdParty/payu-non-seam-less-react/PayUBizSdkModule.java file. To avoid crash which is not fixed by Payu yet

3.Replace 'RadioButtonRN.js' of radio-buttons-react-native in node_module with 
thirdParty/'RadioButtonRN.js' file. For the some customization
